text: Ara tadera madhye emana loka'o ache yara nabike kasta deya ebam bale, ‘se to karnapatakari.’ Baluna, ‘tamra kana tomadera jan'ya ya mangala ta-i sune.‘Tini allah‌ra upara imana anena ebam muminaderake bisbasa kare; ara tomadera madhye yara imanadara tini tadera jan'ya rahamata. Ara yara allah‌ra rasulake kasta deya tadera jan'ya ache yantranadayaka sasti
